summary: HD 2048x2048 Diffuse, Normal and Specular maps for males that aims for a lore friendly look made using handpainting and HD skin photos.
descriptionHtml:
[center][FONT=Century Gothic][img]http://i.imgur.com/RbpRqEl.png[/img]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/mxKQn70.png[/img]
HD 2048x2048 diffuse, normal and specular for male faces. Made using handpainting and HD skin photos. I aimed for a more rugged look that suited the men of Skyrim and that was also lore friendly and a similar style to the vanilla males. However I have also made a more smooth version that is less wrinkled for people want that look (if you don\'t like mine I suggest using [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/27815/?]this mod[/url] by Urshi. Any suggestions for changes I will consider but I made this for me so unless I agree with you I won\'t change it but I do plan to work on this more. If you like my mod an endorsement would be nice it helps to encourage to work more on the game. Thanks!
[img]http://i.imgur.com/ddkLskk.png[/img]
- Any suggestions people may have
- Male body textures
[img]http://i.imgur.com/qZnMoNg.png[/img]
- [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/34213/?]CNHF[/url]. Awesome lore friendly female body replacer that comes with great textures by Nuska.
- [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/37716/?]Somber ENB[/url].
- All [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/2463371/?]Isoku[/url] mods.
[img]http://i.imgur.com/DUQH99U.png[/img]
[youtube]tcbac8s_sB4[/youtube]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/A3U26hU.png[/img]
Use NMM or alternatively just drag the texture folder in the archive and put it in your Data folder. To uninstall just remove the textures from the folder you put them in.
[img]http://i.imgur.com/4a2X2w9.png[/img]
Not compatible with any other mod that retextures faces, if you want my textures just let mine overwrite there\'s.
[img]http://i.imgur.com/qsGuLU2.png[/img]
Many thanks and credit to 
Urshi - [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/27815/?]Fine Face Textures for Men[/url]
Geonox - [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/4141/?]High Res Face Maps for Men[/url]
Pikkatze - [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/1971/?]Smooth Faces for Ladies and Gents[/url]
Mackom - [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/28879/?]Real Skin for Men[/url]
And of course everyone whose work I have learned from or who has given me advice.
[img]http://i.imgur.com/dYJqqwV.png[/img]
- None known. Other than a slight neckseam with the favoured soul body.
[/FONT][/center]
author: Drumber

files.name: DCE - Realistic Male Face Rugged
files.changelogHtml:
Added smooth option.
A bit more seam work, the seam should be the same as with vanilla.

files.name: DCE - Realistic Male Face Smooth

Added smooth option.
A bit more seam work, the seam should be the same as with vanilla.

Added smooth option.
A bit more seam work, the seam should be the same as with vanilla.

files.name: 2048x2048 Rugged Males
files.changelogHtml:
Tweaks to the rugged and smooth diffuse
New normals for all races (Spent the last few days working on this a lot)
WIP Old person normal. May make a new diffuse for them.
Removed normals for smooth version, download and endorse Urshi's face mod and overwrite with mine instead.
Smooth Dark Elf normals for those that don't like wrinkled dark elfs.

files.changelogHtml:

Smooth Dark Elf normals for those that don't like wrinkled dark elfs.

files.name: 2048x2048 Rugged Males
files.changelogHtml:
New specular maps
New rugged and smooth diffuse. Rugged is more rugged looking.
Re-did all normals. Nords look more like they do in the vanilla game.
